about.name: Yufan Zhang
about.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
about.tagline: I build AI-integrated applications and scalable backend systems.
paragraphs: I'm a full stack software engineer with a focus on backend development and AI-integrated systems. I enjoy building products that are both technically robust and practically useful â€” from clean REST APIs to intelligent automation workflows.

Most recently, I worked at Flowing Bee, where I designed and built an AI automation system using Azure OpenAI that reduced processing time from 30 days to 24 hours. I also architected a multi-agent workflow with automated quality checks and implemented secure authentication across the platform.
I'm currently completing my Master of Information Technology (Artificial Intelligence) at the University of Melbourne.

bullets: Built an AI automation system using Azure OpenAI, reducing processing time from 30 days to 24 hours
Designed multi-agent workflow architecture with automated quality checks and smart routing
Developed admin panel with full CRUD for user and organisation management
Implemented OIDC authentication and role-based authorization in FastAPI
Applied TDD achieving 90%+ test coverage for security modules

projects.name: Glucope - Diabetic Patient Management
projects.description: A web-based patient management application supporting daily workflows for patients and clinicians, deployed to Azure and AWS.

projects.name: Microservices Shopping Backend
projects.description: Backend microservices system supporting core e-commerce workflows with inter-service communication and order processing.
